comment.body:
Z tego co widzę, to ten problem powoduje lista `Polskie Filtry Ciasteczkowe`.
Dodanie do reguł użytkownika tej reguły:
```adblock
epuap.gov.pl#@##specialbox-info
```
powinno rozwiązać problem.

@krystian3w Mógłbyś proszę spojrzeć?

comment.body:
Not reproduced it with AdGuard filters. It's caused by `AdBlockID`. You can either disable this filter temporary or wait for the fix.
Another solution is to add the rule to user rules.
```adblock
minioppai.org#@%#//scriptlet('ubo-nobab.js')
```

comment.body:
Thank you, happy to help!
Yes, this is indeed possible, the bar has been added to sites we have already encountered. I'll forward it to the developers. 
To remove different groups of elements (annoyances, buttons of social widgets, tracking, etc.), you can use already known filters, which are also located in the second tab in the filters section.
If an item falls under a category that AdGuard blocks (link to our policy: https://adguard.com/kb/general/ad-filtering/filter-policy/ ), but is not yet blocked by our filters - you can report to us and we will add the rule to the filter.

﻿The video pop up is gone… hopefully it stays that way.  Thank you very much.The element picker used to block specific elements does not work on this page still. Can you please assist me with that? I’ve noticed on some other pages like LinkedIn. I’ll get a dialogue stating that a policy does not allow me to do that; I get no message on the reported Triblive.com page. Best, Jeff Please excuse brevity and typos as this was sent from a mobile device.On Nov 3, 2023, at 6:52 AM, jellizaveta ***@***.***> wrote:﻿

go to the second tab - safari security
select in the second tab - user rules
then click on "add new rule" and paste in ||embed.sendtonews.com^$third-party

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://ya.ru](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fya.ru) ### Comment > Adguard blocking ui elements (popup menu) on Yandex. > This happening on PC browsers and Android browsers. > But easy steps to recreate the problem in Yandex browsers on Android > 1. Clear history and cookies in browser > 2. Disable Adguard > 3. Go to Yandex search > 4. Search something > 5. In search result click on three dots on right side of the link. Appears popup menu (screenshots) Make sure that is has more 1 point to select in this menu. Usually 3 or 4. > 6. Clear history and cookies again > 5. Enable Adguard > 6. Repeat steps 3,4 > 7. In search result clock on three dots on right side of the link. Make sure in popup menu only 1 point to select. (screenshots attached) > Other browsers on PC and Android also have this problem. > Possible option to avoid this create filter: > ||ya.ru^$important,document > But this disable Adguard on all domain. > Please investigate and fix the problem. I don't see anti-adblock on my end. 
This case sometimes happens because the rules are still in the content blockers. To completely disable AdGuard for Safari, you need to turn off AdGuard content blockers in Safari settings.
